Package ru.nsu.g.solovev5.m.task112.game

Class TextDrawer

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.g.solovev5.m.task112.game.TextDrawer
public class TextDrawer extends Object
Represents a text user interface. Provides methods to output data to the given print stream.
